sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz'
import Checkbox from './Checkbox'

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"checkbox"}}>{`Checkbox`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Checkboxes are interactive elements that can be turned on and off by the user`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"base-usage"}}>{`Base usage`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Checkboxes are controlled elements, so the checked state must be handled by
another React Component`}</MDXTag>

__position={0} __code={`<Checkbox name="checkbox" value="1" label="Unchecked checkbox" />
<Checkbox checked name="checkbox" value="2" label="Checked checkbox" />`} __scope={{props: this ? this.props : props,Checkbox}}>

  <Checkbox checked name="checkbox" value="2" label="Checked checkbox" />
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Checkbox} />
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
